text: Gei nia dama o digau ala nogo hagahuaidu goe, ga lloomoi gaa pala gi lala, e haga modongoohia nadau hagalaamua goe. Digau huogodoo ala nogo haga balumee goe, la ga pala adu gi lala o babaawae. Digaula ga haga ingoo goe boloo: Di Waahale o Dimaadua, mo Zion, go di Waahale o di God Dabuaahia o Israel.60.14 Hagagida 3.9
